# Schwarzbach (Wupper)

Schwarzbach () is a small river of North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. It is  long and is a right tributary of the Wupper in Wuppertal. It is one of 14 rivers and streams in North Rhine-Westphalia listed officially under the name Schwarzbach.

*List of rivers of North Rhine-Westphalia
